Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The safety card has been triggered by a certain event. Examine all safety-relevant functions of the system that could trigger such an event.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 is in the safe state (emergency stop circuit still active, cabling fault etc.) and should be enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Place the system in readiness for operation again.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} The IO-Watchdog has been disabled!!!! (User mode debugging!)

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The IO watchdog has been disabled for a user mode debugging session.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} External Periphery - Control card: Reading the ESC-eeprom failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The PDI has no access to the ESC eeprom.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The EtherCAT master has not enabled the access.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Positive limit switch warning.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Positive limit switch warning.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis has been moved to the positive limit switch.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the positive limit switch.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Negative limit switch warning.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Negative limit switch warning.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis has been moved to the negative limit switch.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the negative limit switch.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Amplifier overload utilisation warning.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Amplifier overload utilisation warning level has reached.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Amplifier overload utilisation is greater than warning level in P316.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Motor over-temperature

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The motor temperature has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0204"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the motor temperature exceeds the parametrized value of IDN "S-0-0204", the servo driver will turn off with error "FD07".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor is about to overheat.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Overload - motor

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The motor load has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the motor load exceeds a critical value, the servo driver will turn off with error "FD17".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor is just below the overload limit.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Overload - Internal brake resistor

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The load of the internal brake resistor has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the utilization of the internal brake resistor continues to increase, it will be automatically limited by reducing the braking current and the voltage in the DC link can continue to increase, to the point where the servo driver turns off with error "FD4F".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The internal brake resistor is just below the overload limit. If the limit value is exceeded, the brake resistor will be turned off and the internal ballast power will be lost.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Overload - External brake resistor

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The load of the external brake resistor has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the load of the external brake resistor continues to increase, it will be turned off and the voltage in the DC link can continue to increase, to the point where the servo driver turns off with error "FD4F".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The external brake resistor is just below the overload limit. If the limit value is exceeded, the brake resistor will be turned off and the internal ballast power will be lost.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Over-temperature - Amplifier

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The servo driver temperature has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the servo driver temperature continues to increase, the servo driver will turn off with error "FD4D".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The servo driver is about to overheat.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Under-voltage - DC link

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The DC link voltage has not yet reached the default value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} U_mains too high

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: U_mains too high

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} U_mains too low

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: U_mains too low

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback - Warning bit set

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback system has diagnosed a warning and set the warning bit.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Internal warning of the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback battery warning

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback system has diagnosed a battery warning.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery voltage is under warinig threshold. Position is valid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Next time change battery when drive is in Op! Then the feedback position is continue valid. To clear the warning set flag "Reset feedback battery warning" in P-0357 for one PreOp to SafeOp transition. After that clear flag "Reset feedback battery warning" in P-0-0357.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Testwarning, P-0-0310

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Testwarning, triggered with P-0-0310.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Firmware-Download: Flash error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A fatal error occurred while downloading the firmware into the flash memory.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A internal fatal flash error occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Firmware-Download: Flash error

Detail.Name: Description

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Bootloader defective

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The "Mini-Bootloader" or the normal Bootloader is defective

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The current boot loader version can be found in the TCDriveManager under Device Info.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Ask our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal firmware file is defective

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The internal firmware file is defective.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The current firmware version can be found in the TCDriveManager under Device Info.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Re-load the same firmware file to the AX5000, disconnect the servo drive from mains (incl. 24 V supply voltage) and try again. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal system data file not found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The internal system data file not found.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the system data file is no longer available, the following data are no longer available: Error history, EtherCAT address, Device identifier and Modulo data.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Ask our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal system data file is defective

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The general initialization of the serial flash memory has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Processing failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: General processing of the serial flash memory data has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Write error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: No write access to the serial flash memory due to an address range error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Diagnostics file not found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The diagnostics messages file could not be found.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The serial flash don't contains the required file.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Install an actual firmware file.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Processing of the diagnostics messages: internal error

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Communication error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An EtherCAT communication error occurred during active axis control.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis state machine has reverted to the "Control and power section ready" state due to an EtherCAT communication error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The PC is defective; there is an EMC problem; problems with the EtherCAT cabling; synchronization problems (distributed clocks)

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Initialize error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An attempt was made to activate an uninitialized operating mode.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An attempt was made to select an uninitialized operating mode with the control word S-0-0134.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Initialize the desired operating mode.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Loss of the hardware enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The configured hardware enable input (plug X06) has been deactivated by an external event, even though the AX5000 was under control.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0400"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Problems with the digital inputs (Connector "X06").
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the digital inputs (Connector "X06").

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Got no timer

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A timer is not available.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0400"

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: NC error handling - Timeout

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: With NC error handling activated (P-0-0350), the AX5000 was not stopped by the NC within the parametrized time period (P-0-0351).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0350" and "P-0-0351"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The selected time period is too short.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the time period if your application allows this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The movement is too complex for the parametrized time period.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Program a movement that is suitable for the time period.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Maximum drive off delay time elapsed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The controlled stopping of the AX5000 in the event of an error or via the axis state machine is monitored with the time from the IDN "S-0-0273". The AX5000 could not be stopped within the parametrized time.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0273"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized time period is too short.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the time period, if the application allows this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unrecognized commutation error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: No motor configured

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An attempt was made to enable the axis, even though no motor is configured.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0053"

CauseRemedy.Cause: No motor is configured.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Configure a motor.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Current control not ready to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The current controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position , velocity or torque control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: It is no valid commutation angle present.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Assign a commutation angle.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Velocity control not ready

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The velocity controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position or velocity control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback position is invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Position control not ready

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The position controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position or velocity control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback position is invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Wake and Shake not idle

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The Wake and Shake command could not be executed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Wake and Shake command failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The execution of the Wake and Shake command has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Not possible to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The axis is in calibration mode and cannot be started.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have started the internal calibration mode.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable the internal calibration mode.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Not possible to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The control loops of the axis are used by internal technology functions.

CauseRemedy.Cause: One or more control loops are in use by a technology or by an internal function.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Don't try to enable the axis while one of this functions is active.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The motor connection check failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The check of the motor connection failed.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The configured error propagation input isn't active.
{0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The motor management isn't ready to enable. E.g. P-0-0093 is zero.
{0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Timeout

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The timeout of the command "Autotuning" elapsed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Out of position range

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Permissible movement exceeded.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The system is unstable.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Ensure a stable system. May adjust control loop parameters manually until the system behaves stable.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The "Base velocity amplitude" is too high for the permissibled movement.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: May adjust "Base velocity amplitude" or the permissible movements.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Not possible to start

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: This command can only be executed by one axis at the same time.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This command cannot be executed simultaneously by two axes.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Execute the command for each axis one after the other.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Wrong velocity controller cycle time

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The velocity ctrl cycle time (P-0-0003) has to be 62 us to use this command.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parameter P-0-0003 Velocity ctrl cycle time is not equal 62 us.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Set the parameter P-0-0003 Velocity ctrl cycle time to 62 us.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Not supported

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "Autotuning" is not supported in this firmware version.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": No enable permission from the safety option

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The "Check motor and feedback connection" command has failed because there is no enable permission from the safety option.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The command is executed, but the safety card has been activated by a malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant and perform a reset.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The command is executed, but the safety card has been activated by a cable breakage in the 24 V supply to the card.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the cable breakage and perform a reset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": No hardware enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The execution of the "Autotuning" command has failed because the configured hardware enable is missing.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The hardware enable of the corresponding terminal point on plug "X06" is missing.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Apply the hardware enable (IDN P-0-0400).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "Autotuning" can't be executed because the current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->Commutation methods" and AX5000_IDN-Description-->P-0-0160.

CauseRemedy.Cause: No valid commutation offset.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: See operating instructions

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} The advanced parametrization introduced with firmware version 2.10 is required.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The advanced parametrization introduced with firmware version 2.10 is required.

CauseRemedy.Cause: It is NOT recommended to use a parametrization ('startup list') created for a firmware version less than v2.10!
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use an appropriate TcDriveManager to create a new parametrization ('startup list'). Please contact the support if this isn't possible.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Motor and feedback check": Timeout

Detail.Text: The timeout of the command "motor and feedback check" elapsed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Motor and feedback check": No hardware enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The execution of the "Check motor and feedback" command has failed because the configured hardware enable is missing.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The hardware enable of the corresponding terminal point on plug "X06" is missing.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Apply the hardware enable (IDN P-0-0400).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Motor and feedback check": Current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "Motor and feedback check" can't be executed because the current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->Commutation methods" and AX5000_IDN-Description-->P-0-0160.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Reset-Command: One or more of the pending errors is not resettable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The reset command has failed because at least one of the present errors cannot be reset.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the present error.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Reset-Command: Reset is not executable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Reset command not executable, the axis hasn't been stopped yet.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis is still in motion.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Wait for the axis to come to a standstill and then repeat the command.

Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0310"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Standard reactions to errors can be tested with the command P-0-0310. The resulting diagnostic message is exclusively a reminder that there is actually no error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: This diagnostic message requires no remedial action.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Reset": Not possible - Drive is still enabled

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the SoE axis state machine on the master side.

Detail.Text: An attempt was made during the feedback initialization to use the option card, even though this is not present.

Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180"

CauseRemedy.Cause: AX570x option card is not inserted or is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Insert or exchange the card.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have selected the AX570x option card by mistake during the parametrization of the feedback system IDN "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change the parametrization of the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback error: Plug connector combination invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The process and parameter data cannot be processed with the selected plug connector combination.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The process and parameter data of a feedback systems are not processed with X11 and X21, but in a combination of X11, X21 with X41, X42 (encoder option card).
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Always process the data of a feedback systems with X11, X21 or X41, X42, i.e. either with the connectors on the front or with the connectors on the encoder option card.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback error: No OCT support.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Feedback error: No OCT support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 hardware doesn't support the OCT interface. The serial number of the AX5000 is below 105 000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the AX5000 with one with a serial number greater than 105 000.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A problem has occurred with the AT / MDT list.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the application and remove one or more unnecessary IDNs from "S-0-0016" / "S-0-0024".

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware or software error.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions -Chapter "Commissioning-->Process data handling" and AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0016"

CauseRemedy.Cause: An IDN has been entered in the IDN "S-0-0016" that does not exist in the firmware you are using.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Remove this IDN from "S-0-0016".

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Over-current error motor, measuring limit reached (X13 / X23).

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The drive software detected an over-current on the motor phases. The limit of the current measuring range was reached.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error depends on the total system configured:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The solution depends on the total system configured:

CauseRemedy.Cause: Synchronous motor, current-controlled with absolute position information per pole pair.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Synchronous motor, current-controlled with incremental feedback.
Synchronous motor, current-controlled without feedback
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor with feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller and the IDNs P-0-0107 and S-0-0106.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor without feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the load conditions and if necessary activate the acceleration controller (IDNs P-0-0112, P-0-0113, P-0-0114 and P-0-0451) and/or the breakdown protection controller (IDNs P-0-0115, P-0-0116, P-0-0117 and P-0-0451).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Collision detected.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: By the torque deviation monitoring has been a collision detected (see P-0-0359).

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Torque control with velocity limitation is not supported in this firmware version.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Velocity Control: Control deviation monitoring failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The velocity deviation exceeded the limit value (see P-x-0518).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: ""P-x-0518"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The control deviation has exceeded the value of IDN P-x-0518.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and increase the value in the IDN P-x-0518, if appropriate.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mechanical system is too sluggish.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and try make the mechanical system smoother.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error has occurred in the set value generation.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the cause (NC, internal set value generation, etc.). If no solution can be found, contact support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The current limit has been reached.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the motor parametrization or your calculation and check whether the motor can theoretically follow the set values.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The control parameter are unfavorable.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Optimize the control parameter.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The set value dynamic characteristics are set too "hard".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and check whether it is theoretically possible to achieve the specified dynamics.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Problems with actual value monitoring.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the position.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Overtravel limit exceeded.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Overtravel limit exceeded.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Excessive position deviation

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The servo drive has detected a following error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The following error has exceeded the maximum value of IDN S-0-0159.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and increase the maximum value in the IDN S-0-0159, if appropriate.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mechanical system is too sluggish.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and try make the mechanical system smoother.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error has occurred in the set value generation.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the cause (NC, internal set value generation, etc.). If no solution can be found, contact support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The speed limit has been reached. For more informations look at the parameter S-0-0091, S-0-0113 and the motor characteristics.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the motor parametrization or your calculation and check the maximum motor speed value used in the calculation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The current limit has been reached. For more informations look at the parameter S-0-0136, S-0-0137, S-0-0109, S-0-0111 and the motor characteristic.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the motor parametrization or your calculation and check whether the motor can theoretically follow the set values.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The set value dynamic characteristics are set too "hard".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and check whether it is theoretically possible to achieve the specified dynamics.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset invalid: The Feedback-System has been exchanged.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The saved position offset is invalid because the serial number of the encoder has changed. E.g. a different motor has been connect.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: No position offset existing

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: No position offset existing

CauseRemedy.Cause: A position offset should used in the position control loop, but no position offset has been saved.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: Offset can't be activated. Modulo calculation is active.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: Offset can't be activated. Modulo calculation is active.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Activate the position offset before enabling the modulo calculation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Update the AX5000 firmware to a version 2.06 or higher.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: No position offset existing

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: No position offset existing

CauseRemedy.Cause: A position offset should used in the position control loop, but no valid position offset has been found.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: The position offset change is greater than the modulo value.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: The position offset change is greater than the modulo value.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled and the modulo value is less than the position offset change.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use only position offset changes less than the modulo value.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Drive memory commutation offset: The feedback don't match.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Drive memory commutation offset: The feedback don't match.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Drive memory commutation offset: No saved offset existing.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Drive memory commutation offset: No saved offset existing

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Drive memory commutation offset: No valid saved offset existing

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Drive memory commutation offset: No valid saved offset existing

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: No saved data could be loaded.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: No saved data could be loaded.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the stored modulo values should be loaded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable and re-enable the modulo calculation.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: Initialization data invalid.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: Initialization data invalid.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the stored modulo values should be loaded. The loaded data values are invalid. E.g. the encoder has changed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable and re-enable the modulo calculation.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: No saved data available.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: No saved data available.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the stored modulo values should be loaded. No data found.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable and re-enable the modulo calculation.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: Saving of the initialization data failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: Saving of the initialization data failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the modulo values should be stored.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable and re-enable the modulo calculation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the modulo values should be stored.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Contact support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: Saving of the modulo data failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: Saving of the modulo data failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the modulo values should be stored.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable and re-enable the modulo calculation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An error occurred while the modulo values should be stored.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Contact support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: The absolute range of encoder 1 is too small.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: The absolute range of encoder 1 is too small.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The modulo calculation with data storage can only be used if a multi-turn feedback is connected.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect and use a multi-turn feedback as feedback 1.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: The absolute range of encoder 2 is too small.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: The absolute range of encoder 2 is too small.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The modulo calculation with data storage can only be used if a multi-turn feedback is connected.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect and use a multi-turn feedback as feedback 2.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Modulo Calculation: Initialization failed because the feedback position is invalid.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: Initialization failed because the feedback position is invalid.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The initialization of the modulo calculation failed because the feedback position isn't valid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check if feedback errors are present.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Initialization of the device: failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the AX5000 has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The digital output was used more than once.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the digital output assignment.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Initialization of the device: failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the AX5000 has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Internal error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Contact support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Initialization of the device: Failed - Firmware checksum

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the AX5000 has failed (Invalid firmware checksum).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Sync0 - Cycle time

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The cycle time of Sync0 is parametrized to an invalid value.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The configuration of the "distributed clocks" is optimally set as standard by the TwinCAT system and should be ready to run without any problems. Any changes that may be required should only be carried out by well-trained specialists.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The cycle time of Sync0 may only be configured at 62.5 µs, 125 µs or 250 µs.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cycle time of Sync0.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Sync0 - Not enabled

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Sync0 is not activated

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The configuration of the "distributed clocks" is optimally set as standard by the TwinCAT system and should be ready to run without any problems. Any changes that may be required should only be carried out by well-trained specialists.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Sync0 is not activated
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Activate Sync0.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Sync0 - Impulse length

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The pulse length of Sync0 is not valid.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The configuration of the "distributed clocks" is optimally set as standard by the TwinCAT system and should be ready to run without any problems. Any changes that may be required should only be carried out by well-trained specialists.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrization of the Sync0 pulse length is invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the parametrization of the Sync0 pulse length.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Sync1 - Cycle time

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The cycle time of Sync1 is parametrized to an invalid value.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The configuration of the "distributed clocks" is optimally set as standard by the TwinCAT system and should be ready to run without any problems. Any changes that may be required should only be carried out by well-trained specialists.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The cycle time of Sync1 must be a multiple of the Sync0 cycle time.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cycle time of Sync1.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: hardware sync

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The hardware synchronization is not available any more.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware or software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Process data synchronization lost

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The process data synchronization is not available any more.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: Further information can be found in the "Beckhoff Information System" on the homepage of www.Beckhoff.de.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The PC is sending invalid signals (jitter). Numerous causes are hardware problems and device drivers which mask the interrupts.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the PC.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Synchronization of the distributed clocks failed
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Restart the EtherCAT-Master.

CauseRemedy.Cause: CRC-Error on the EtherCAT bus
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Several EtherCAT telegrams have been lost.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Start an "Emergency scan" in the "System Manager"

CauseRemedy.Cause: I/O update takes place at the end of the task.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: In the System Manager parameterize the I/O update at the start of the task.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The prioritization of the individual tasks is unfavorable.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the task prioritization.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: Local DC-time calculation failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The local calculated DC-time differs too much from the ESC DC-time.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Distributed clocks: PLL sync lost

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The synchronization to the distributed clock has been lost.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 is connected to an EtherCAT Master which is not in Master Mode.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The EtherCAT Master where this drive is a slave to, needs to be reconfigured to run in Master Mode. This may affect other components and timings.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware or software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Detail.Text: EtherCAT slave controller: Invalid port configuration

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Contact support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Dynamic SyncManager: IO-Cycle counter error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Dynamic SyncManager: IO-Cycle counter error

CauseRemedy.Cause: The monitoring of the cycle counter in the dynamic sync manager process data failed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check if your application provides a valid cycle counter.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Dynamic SyncManager: Required SyncManager not enabled.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Dynamic SyncManager: Required SyncManager not enabled.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The drive operation mode has changed to a mode which uses the dynamic sync manager while the dynamic sync manager are not enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check if your application activates the dynamic sync manager.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Internal communication error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Communication problems between control card and driver card.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor plugs (X13 or X23) are not firmly screwed onto the AX5000. Possible leakage currents do not flow via the housing to the rear panel, but through the AX5000 and cause malfunctions there.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Screw the motor plug(s) firmly to the AX5000.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 is not screwed firmly enough to the rear panel. Possible leakage currents do not flow via the housing to the rear panel, but through the AX5000 and cause malfunctions there.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Screw the AX5000 firmly to the metallic rear panel.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} A/D-Converter: DC-Link - measuring error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The analog/digital converter has picked up an invalid signal during measurement of the DC link voltage.

CauseRemedy.Cause: EMC-Problems.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Send the AX5000 to the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Overvoltage - supply voltage

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The regulated voltage of the sense line is too high and cannot be reduced to 5.0 V.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an "external voltage" on the sense line of the feedback system "1".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Locate this external voltage and suppress it.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The voltage regulation or the voltage measurement in the AX5000 is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Undervoltage - Supply voltage

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The regulated voltage of the sense line is too low and cannot be increased to 5.0 V.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Installation-->Electrical installation-->Feedback"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback line is too long.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please shorten the feedback line.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Current consumption of the feedback system is too high.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the feedback system and replace if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The voltage regulation or the voltage measurement in the AX5000 is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Lost feedback

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The AX5000 did not measure any feedback voltage.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: After this fault the feedback system voltage will be switched off. Please use an Ohm meter to check the lines.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback connector is not correctly attached.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please fasten the feedback connector securely to the AX5000.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Either the feedback or the sense line is faulty.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the line.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The sense signal parameters are invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the parameters.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Found different feedback in the digital name plate.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parametrized feedback does not correspond to the feedback details entered in the digital type label.

CauseRemedy.Cause: During the motor replacement a motor with different feedback was connected.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please correct the feedback-parameterization.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have chosen a motor, whose feedback does not correspond to the parametrized feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please select a motor accordingly.

Detail.Text: The command to save the position offset failed due to a timeout.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Position initialization failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "position initialization" offset failed due to a timeout.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The data transmission on the feedback parameter channel failed due to a timeout (data receipt).

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Data transfer failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The data transmission on the feedback parameter channel failed due to a timeout (commutation offset).

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Wrong feedback

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The expected feedback system could not be confirmed.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the manufacturer entered in the IDN P-0-0150 correlates to the actual manufacturer, please check the exact model designation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Linear motor You have entered a feedback system in the IDN P-0-0150 that cannot be confirmed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Determine the correct feedback system and enter it in the IDN P-0-0150

CauseRemedy.Cause: Rotary motor: You have selected the wrong motor and thus possibly also the wrong feedback system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Select the correct motor.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Resolution has been incorrectly parametrized

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The resolution parametrized in the feedback system does not correspond to the resolution entered in the IDN "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180" (multi-turn).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution multi-turn position" or "P-0-0180-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution multi-turn position"

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have selected an incorrect feedback system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Compare the selected feedback system with the actually existing one.

CauseRemedy.Cause: During the motor replacement a motor with different feedback was connected.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please correct the feedback-parameterization.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback database was incorrectly parametrized.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Call our support dept. and replace the feedback database.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Resolution has been incorrectly parametrized

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The resolution parametrized in the feedback system does not correspond to the resolution entered in the IDN "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180" (single-turn).

Detail.Name: Info

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Call our support dept. and replace the feedback database.

Detail.Name: Description

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Process channel-->Data-->Length per signal period" or "P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Length per signal period"

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have selected an incorrect feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please correct the feedback-parameterization.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Call our support dept. and replace the feedback database.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Data transfer failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Too many errors occurred during the data transmission on the feedback parameter channel.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback line is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the line.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Wrong feedback system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Enter the correct feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Feedback id has been incorrectly parametrized

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Parameter channel-->Identifier" or "P-0-0180-->Parameter channel-->Identifier"

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have selected an incorrect feedback system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Compare the selected feedback system with the actually existing one.

CauseRemedy.Cause: During the motor replacement a motor with different feedback was connected.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed (BiSS).

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Unknown multi-turn position

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An unknown multi-turn position was parametrized in the feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The internal parametrization of the feedback system is incorrect.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Invalid commutation offset

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The commutation offset entered in the digital name plate of the motor is invalid.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: It is not sufficient just to exchange the feedback system, because the commutation offset must be determined and entered in the factory.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The commutation offset has not been entered in the digital name plate or the value is not plausible.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the motor.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback"general": No feedback connector chosen

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The scanning of the feedback failed, because no feedback connection has been parametrized.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Power settings-->Connector" or "P-0-0180-->Power settings-->Connector"

CauseRemedy.Cause: No feedback connection has been parametrized.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please parameterize a feedback connection.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback"general": Wrong feedback connector chosen

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The scanning of the feedback failed, because no feedback connection has been parametrized.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Power settings-->Connector" or "P-0-0180-->Power settings-->Connector"

CauseRemedy.Cause: No feedback connection has been parametrized.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please parameterize a feedback connection.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Data transfer failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The data transmission on the feedback parameter channel failed due to a timeout (commutation offset).

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Linear parameter invalid.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150 or P-0-0180"

CauseRemedy.Cause: See IDN P-0-0150 for the primary feedback or P-0-0180 for secondary feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the value "Linear resolution about digital interface in nm"

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback"general": Parameter channel - Position invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The position of the feedback system is invalid

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Linear feedback: the reader head and the measuring tape are maladjusted.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Adjust the reader head to the measuring tape.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Invalid feedback parameterization.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system has been incorrectly parametrized.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the feedback system (P-0-0150 or P-0-0180).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A parameter error occurred.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN "P-0-0150 Parameter channel-->Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position or absolute position" = 0
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the parameter.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Sum of the Parameter IDN "P-0-0150 Parameter channel-->Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position or absolute position" + IDN "P-0-0150 Parameter channel-->Number of clock cycles to get multi-turn position" is not equal to 25 or 21 or 13
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the parameter.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Save data failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The timeout of the command "Save feedback identification" elapsed.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0158" oder "P-0-0188"

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Save data failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A memory error occurred while the command "Save feedback identification" was executed.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0162" or "P-0-0192"

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The connected feedback isn't equal to the parameterized in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The connected feedback has a different linear resolution as parameterized in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Position initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The position initialization failed because the axis is in motion and the actual feedback velocity is to high.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parameterized feedback in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 has a invalid value for the max extrapolation cycles.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

CauseRemedy.Cause: This feature is only support for feedbacks connected to the AX572x!

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Parameter invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parameterized feedback in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 has a invalid single or multi-turn resolution.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Rotatory: "Bit resolution single-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position" over 32 bit.
Rotatory: "Bit resolution multi-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get multi-turn position" over 16 bit.
Linear: "Bit resolution single-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position" over 48 bit.
Linear: "Bit resolution multi-turn position" over 16 bit or "Number of clock cycles to get multi-turn position" over 0 bit.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback"general": Error by cyclic communication over parameter channel

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Communication error over para channel to get position and status from feedback.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed. The digital name plate could not be read (EnDat).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150" and "P-0-0180"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: A digital name plate exists only in Beckhoff motors from the AM3000 series.

CauseRemedy.Cause: On the basis of the parametrization of the IDN P-0-0150 or P-0-0180, check whether you have parametrized the IDN to match the feedback system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change the parametrization if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is defective.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed. The resolution of the position value is >32 bit (EnDat) for "single-turn".

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution single-turn position" and "P-0-0180-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution single-turn position"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The AX5000 supports a max. position value resolution of 32 bits (EnDat) with "single-turn".

CauseRemedy.Cause: Check the parametrization of the resolution in the IDN P-0-0150 or P-0-0180.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change the parametrization if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Defective feedback system, parametrized internal resolution is too high.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the feedback system.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "general": Initialization failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed. The resolution of the position value is >12 bit (EnDat) for "multi-turn".

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution multi-turn position" and "P-0-0180-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution multi-turn position"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The AX5000 supports a max. position value resolution of 12 bits (EnDat) with "multi-turn".

CauseRemedy.Cause: Check the parametrization of the resolution in the IDN P-0-0150 or P-0-0180.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "AX572x": Parameter error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parameterizing of the feedback system was faulty.

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0152 or P-0-0182 "gear numerator" and P-0-0153 or P-0-0183 "gear denominator"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: This parameter must be greater than 0
The result of this division must be greater than 1024
The result of this division must be greater than 1024
Die Parameter "Resolution per rotation; Length pro signal period; Linear resolution" must be greater than 0.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "AX572x": Feedback battery error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback has an battery error. Position is not valid and must new referenced.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: P-0-0357: "Ignore and reset feedback battery error"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery voltage to low.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change battery. Set Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" in P-0357 for one PreOp to SafeOp transition. In Op reference the position and then clear the flag in P-0-0357.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery is not connected to feedback power supply.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect battery to feedback. Set Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" in P-0357 for one PreOp to Safe=p transition. In Op reference the position and then clear the flag in P-0-0357.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "AX572x": Parameter error in P-0-0357

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: In P-0-0357 the parameterizing of the feedback system was faulty.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: P-0-0357: "Ignore and reset feedback battery error" or "Reset feedback battery warning"

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0357: Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" is only by battery error allowed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Clear flag "Ignor and reset for one PreOp->SafeOp transition feedback battery error" in P-0-0357.

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0357: Flag "Reset feedback battery warning" is only by battery warning allowed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Clear flag "Reset for one PreOp->SafeOp transition feedback battery warning" in P-0-0357.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Invalid parameters "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos".

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Invalid parameters "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos": 1. Signal periods per rotation 2. Length per signal period

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->signal periods per rotation"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->signal periods per rotation" must greater than 0.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->Length per signal period"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->Length per signal period" must greater than 0 by linear encoder.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos" Multiturnlength greater than 140,737488355328km.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos: multiturnlength = "signal periods per rotation" * "length per signal period" must lower than 140,737488355328km

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Invalid parameter "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Para channel-->Linear resolution about digital interface".

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Invalid parameter "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Para channel-->Linear resolution about digital interface" must greater than 0.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Para channel-->Linear resolution about digital interface"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Para channel-->Linear resolution about digital interface" must greater than 0.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Para channel-->Linear resolution about digital interface".

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback error TTL: Quadrature encoder error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Feedback error TTL: Quadrature encoder error

CauseRemedy.Cause: With some TTL feedback systems this problem occurs during the initialization phase.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Enter 500 ms as the value for the IDN P-0-0150 "Wait time after power up".

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is a large amount of interference to the feedback signal.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please analyze and remove this interference.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is faulty.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please replace the motor.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "Resolver": Amplitude correction limit exceeded.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The upper or lower limit of the amplitude correction has been exceeded.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Process channel-->Data-->Resolver-->Sin/Cos Amplitude correction"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: When the amplitude correction value less than 1, the cosine amplitude is adjusted, when the value is greater than 1, the sine amplitude is adjusted.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The amplitude correction limit values (0.9-1.1) have been exceeded in IDN "P-0-0150".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the parametrization of IDN "P-0-0150".

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "EtherCAT Encoder": Position init value is invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The AX5000 has detected a position error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The difference between the given position init value in P-0-0622 and the received value in P-0-0620 is to big.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Adjust the initialization value in P-0-0622.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "EtherCAT Encoder": Received status signals an error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The AX5000 has detected a position error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The received encoder status in P-0-0621 signals an invalid encoder value.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the transmitted values to the AX5000.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Safety card activated

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The safety card has been activated and has placed the servo drive in the safe state.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis is enabled and the safety card has been activated by a malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant and perform a reset.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis is enabled and the safety card has been activated by a cable breakage in the 24 V supply to the card.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the cable breakage and perform a reset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} LCD-Display: Initialization error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An error has occurred during internal initialization of the LCD display.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} LCD-Display: Time out

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An time out has occurred during internal initialization of the LCD display.

CauseRemedy.Cause: A Fatal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Positive limit switch error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Positive limit switch error.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Negative limit switch error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Negative limit switch reached

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis has been moved to the negative limit switch.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the negative limit switch.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Over speed error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The speed of the axis is higher than the parametrized maximum value in S-0-0113

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0113"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check whether the value of parameter S-0-0113 corresponds to the value from the technical data of the motor.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the motor is turning so fast and rectify this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: If the application requires a maximum value of 3000, you must set the value in S-0-0113 approx. 10% higher, so that the servo drive can adjust the 3000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the value in S-0-0113.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Commutation error; the motor accelerates in an uncontrolled fashion.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the commutation of the motor is not correct.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An external force is acting on the drive system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze whether that is permissible and parameterize the drive system if necessary.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Over speed error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The speed of the axis is higher than the parametrized maximum value in S-0-0113

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0113"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check whether the value of parameter S-0-0113 corresponds to the value from the technical data of the motor.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the motor is turning so fast and rectify this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: If the application requires a maximum value of 3000, you must set the value in S-0-0113 approx. 10% higher, so that the servo drive can adjust the 3000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the value in S-0-0113.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Commutation error; the motor accelerates in an uncontrolled fashion.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the commutation of the motor is not correct.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An external force is acting on the drive system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze whether that is permissible and parameterize the drive system if necessary.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Amplifier overload utilization error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parametrized utilization limit of the AX5000 has been reached.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0093 and P-0-0316"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized utilization limit is too low.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the limit value.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The application overloads the AX5000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use a larger AX5000 if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error message can be suppressed; the current is lowered to P-0-0093 on reaching the utilization limit.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Parameterize the IDN P-0-0316 accordingly.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Current limitation: U/F error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The current limitation of the AX5000 was triggered.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mechanical system is too sluggish.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and try make the mechanical system smoother.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The application overloads the AX5000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use a larger AX5000 if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The use of asynchronous motors:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the load conditions and if necessary activate the acceleration controller (IDNs P-0-0112, P-0-0113, P-0-0114 and P-0-0451) and/or the breakdown protection controller (IDNs P-0-0115, P-0-0116, P-0-0117 and P-0-0451).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Monitoring functions: Shorted coil / DC brake error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The drive detected a over-current error during the brake application.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0106 and S-0-0107"

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error depends on the total system configured and occurs only during the armature short circuit braking / DC braking:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The solution depends on the total system configured.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller and the IDNs P-0-0106 and S-0-0107. Analyze the load conditions during the braking procedure.

Detail.Text: The maximum output frequency limit (see device specification) has been exceeded.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The positive limit switch was activated while the axis was moving negative.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The limit switch connection seems to be inverted.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the limit switch connection.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Negative limit switch activated while moving positive

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Motor management: Drive type don't match.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Motor management: The motor dataset used is optimized for a different drive, and this drive is unable to operate it optimally.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor data were copied from one servo drive to the other.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: In the TCDriveManager select the motor used from the motor database. The system will then provide the motor data optimized for this drive type.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Motor management: Motor type don't match.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The type of motor according to the electronic motor type label does not match the motor type in TcDriveManager.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The entry in TcDriveManager: "AM3042-0G30" and the entry in the electronic motor type label "AM3042-0G30-0000" are not identical.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Typo while entering the motor type in the TcDriveManager.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please enter the motor type in TcDriveManager exactly as it is shown in the electronic type label.

Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Product description-->Technical data"; AM3000/3500_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Technical data"

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please choose another combination of motors.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Motor brake current: Measuring error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An impermissible signal was detected during the measurement of the motor brake current.

CauseRemedy.Cause: EMC-Problems.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Send the AX5000 to the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} A/D-Converter: Peripheral voltage - measuring error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The analog/digital converter has picked up an invalid signal during measurement of the peripheral voltage.

CauseRemedy.Cause: EMC-Problems.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal hardware error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Send the AX5000 to the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.
